name: MERCAPTIZOL
treatmentDescriptions: For the treatment of hyperthyroidism.בקשה לתוספת משטר מינון: 8/8/2023Adult - The initial daily dosage is 15 mg for mild hyperthyroidism, 30 to 40 mg for moderately severe hyperthyroidism, and 60 mg for severe hyperthyroidism, divided into 3 doses at 8-hour intervals. The maintenance dosage is 5 to 15 mg daily. To achieve a required dosage of 5 mg, an intake of 10 mg every other day is suggested.Pediatric - Initially, the daily dosage is 0.4 mg/kg of body weight divided into 3 doses and given at 8-hour intervals. The maintenance dosage is approximately 1/2 of the initial dose.
